Reviews.Content: glamorous hotel comfortable clean quiet plenty convenience items located walking distance jerrys deli includes bar western bagel ralphs grocery store riteaid starbucks news stand etc mini fridge microwave plus slightly low amenities bring own travel toilettries front desk staff extremely friendly helpful free usa lobby morning bonus
